channel.title: Simple way to make a Wait time? ??

item.title: Simple way to make a Wait time? ??
item.dc:creator: @wanabeagle wanabeagle
item.description:
@wanabeagle wrote:

I just need a way to make my code wait before it executes the next commands… (I’m on a 508 server) I’ve searched on google and the forums and haven’t found anything 508 related or understandable…

else if(cmd[0].equals("updateserver") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("levi")) { for(Player ap : Engine.players) { if (ap != null) { player.actionTimer = 1; p.frames.sendMessage(ap, "<col=ff0000>Server Updating!"); player.actionTimer = 2; p.frames.sendMessage(ap, "<col=ff0000>Restarting in 10 seconds..."); player.actionTimer = 3; p.frames.sendMessage(ap, "<col=ff0000>Restarting in 9 seconds..."); player.actionTimer = 4; p.frames.sendMessage(ap, "<col=ff0000>Restarting in 8 seconds..."); } } }

Thanks,
-Wanabeagle

item.source: Simple way to make a Wait time? ??
